insert into productAuthor( product_seq ,author_seq ,delNy ,aDefaultNy ,pDefaultNy )value( #{product_seq} ,#{author_seq} ,0 ,0 ,0 )

mapper.update: UPDATE productAuthor a JOIN ( SELECT paSeq, CASE WHEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY product_seq ORDER BY paSeq) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS aDefaultNy, CASE WHEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY author_seq ORDER BY paSeq) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS pDefaultNy FROM productAuthor ) AS b ON a.paSeq = b.paSeq SET a.aDefaultNy = b.aDefaultNy, a.pDefaultNy = b.pDefaultNy
